snippet: The company said it more than made up for the loss by adding subscribers in Latin America. Over all, DirecTV reported a 1.4 percent increase in net income, to $711 million, for the second quarter.
abstract: The company said it more than made up for the loss by adding subscribers in Latin America. Over all, DirecTV reported a 1.4 percent increase in net income, to $711 million, for the second quarter.

headline.main: DirecTV Reports Its First Drop in U.S. Subscribers
headline.print_headline: DirecTV Reports a Decline In Subscribers in the U.S.
